name: Castles & Cannons
description:
Welcome to Castles & Cannons a multiplayer castle based shooter. Build your castle in AR then use the castle to battle in shared screen combat against your friend. Fire the cannon by raising your voice and explode the ball with a big shout. SR Supported to navigate the main menu, enable in settings for an almost hands-free experience.

Currently, the game is only a prototype to show functionality so networking and single player is unavailable but may be introduced if the game gets more attention.
